elements.description:
`editable-table-editor-insdel`

A button in the editable-table-editor-rowcol menu 
(editable-table-editor-rowcol.html) that inserts or 
deletes a row or column .

properties.name: action
properties.description: The action of the menu item

properties.name: index
properties.description: The index of the row or column

properties.name: before
properties.description: If insert, does it insert before? Default is insert after.

attributes.name: action
attributes.description: The action of the menu item

attributes.name: index
attributes.description: The index of the row or column

attributes.name: before
attributes.description: If insert, does it insert before? Default is insert after.

elements.description:
`editable-table-editor-rowcol`

A header label and menu for inserting and deleting a row or a column 
of the editable-table interface (editable-table.html).

properties.name: index
properties.description: The index of the row or column

properties.name: label
properties.description: The index of the row or column

attributes.name: index
attributes.description: The index of the row or column

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The index of the row or column

elements.description:
`editable-table-editor-toggle`

A toggle button for an property in the editable-table 
interface (editable-table.html).

methods.name: _onChange
methods.description: Set up event listener to fire when toggled

elements.description:
`editable-table-editor-cell`

An editable cell in the editable-table-editor 
(editable-table-editor.html) interface.

methods.name: _getCellLabel
methods.description: if clicking in td but outside textarea, focus the text area

methods.name: _onValueChanged
methods.description: if clicking in td but outside textarea, focus the text area

methods.name: getCaretPosition
methods.description:
FROM: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2897155/get-cursor-position-in-characters-within-a-text-input-field
Returns the caret (cursor) position of the specified text field.
Return value range is 0-oField.value.length.

methods.name: setCaretPosition
methods.description: make sure caret is in the correct position

elements.description:
`editable-table-editor`

An editor interface for editable-table (editable-table.html). 
(See editable-table-behaviors.html for more information.)

properties.name: accentSelected
properties.description: Get accent color and change unspecified to none.

properties.name: hideTableSort
properties.description: Hide the table sorting & filtering menu

methods.name: _getCurrentRow
methods.description: Gets the row data for a given row index

methods.name: _isFirstRow
methods.description: Tests for first row of data. Workaround to restamp column headers.

methods.name: _onCellMove
methods.description: Move the focus/cursor to the correct cell when navigation keys are pressed

methods.name: _onCellValueChange
methods.description: Updates data when cell value changes

methods.name: _onTableSettingChange
methods.description: Updates table properties when setting changes

methods.name: _setMinimumData
methods.description: Makes sure there is always on cell to work from

methods.name: _tableStylesHidden
methods.description: Are all of the table style choices hidden?

methods.name: _tableThemeHidden
methods.description: Are all of the theme choices hidden?

methods.name: _tableSortHidden
methods.description: Are all of the theme choices hidden?

methods.name: deleteColumn
methods.description: Delete a column at the given index

methods.name: deleteRow
methods.description: Delete a row at the given index

methods.name: insertColumn
methods.description: Insert a column at the given index

methods.name: insertRow
methods.description: Insert a row at the given index

attributes.name: accent-selected
attributes.description: Get accent color and change unspecified to none.

attributes.name: hide-table-sort
attributes.description: Hide the table sorting & filtering menu

elements.description:
`editable-table-sort`

A column header that functions as a three-state sort button 
(no sort, sort ascending, sort descending) for the 
table-editor-display mode (table-editor-display.html).

properties.name: sortMode
properties.description: Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

properties.name: sortColumn
properties.description: The index of the current sort column

properties.name: sorting
properties.description: If this is the sort column, sorting is on

methods.name: _isSorting
methods.description: Is the column number is the same as the current sort column?

attributes.name: sort-mode
attributes.description: Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

attributes.name: sort-column
attributes.description: The index of the current sort column

attributes.name: sorting
attributes.description: If this is the sort column, sorting is on

elements.description:
`editable-table-filter`
Displays a cell in the editable-table-display mode 
(editable-table-display.html) as a filter button.

`editable-table-display`

Displays a table with theming, styling, sorting, resonsive, and 
filtering features.  (See editable-table-behaviors.html 
for more information.)

properties.name: editMode
properties.description: Is the table in edit mode?

properties.name: sortMode
properties.description: Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

properties.name: sortColumn
properties.description: The index of the current sort column

methods.name: _isFiltered
methods.description: sets a column's cells to filtered when in filtered mode so that filter can toggle

methods.name: _isRowHeader
methods.description: Calculate if the cell is a th or td

methods.name: filterRows
methods.description: Handle filter based on collumn and text of cell that is clicked

attributes.name: edit-mode
attributes.description: Is the table in edit mode?

attributes.name: sort-mode
attributes.description: Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

attributes.name: sort-column
attributes.description: The index of the current sort column

properties.name: editMode
properties.description: Is the table in edit-mode? Default is false (display mode).

methods.name: toggleEditMode
methods.description: Toggles between edit-mode and display mode.

attributes.name: edit-mode
attributes.description: Is the table in edit-mode? Default is false (display mode).
